sources.title: Powderkeg (1971) Rod Taylor, Dennis Cole | Action, Adventure, War | Full Movie
sources.description:
Just before World War I, two adventurers are hired to bring back a hijacked train from Mexico.

Original title: Powderkeg (1971) AKA: Bearcats! 
Made for television as the pilot for the series Bearcats! (1971)

Director & Writer: Douglas Heyes
Stars: Rod Taylor, Dennis Cole, Fernando Lamas 
Genres: Action, Adventure, War, Western, Made for TV
